name: The Ghost Of Flash Ads Past
name_original: The Ghost Of Flash Ads Past
description:
Made for the 2020 Teeny Tiny DragonRuby MiniGameJam

Relive the holidays of the early 2000's where you were asked to punch monkeys and give presents to Santa in order to win a coveted prize such as an iPod, Playstation, Nintendo 64, etc.

Are you a bad enough dude to deliver 1,000 presents to Santa in 20 seconds?

Controls

Click Santa as many times as you can in 20 seconds

Press 'r' to restart the game
